website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a shoe that offers comfort and a stable ride, this shoe is perfect for you. The Asics 33-FA is a neutral running shoe that performs well on the roads. This is great for daily training and other athletic activities.
pros: The 33-FA features a lightweight open mesh, which is highly breathable
The Amplifoam of the shoe provides consistent and uniform cushioning that’s great for those who desire a more responsive platform
Most runners applauded the overall construction, cushioning and fit of the Asics 33-FA
The ComforDry Sock Liner delivers anti-microbial features, moisture protection and added cushioning
Some runners took note of the durable features of the shoe
The FluidAxis grooves in the sole unit encourage natural freedom of motion
cons: Some runners noted that the outsole grip needs improvement
The shoe was a bit narrow in the midfoot area for some runners

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but flat feet
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and I ran 100km wearing these shoes but it has flat sole. Not suitable for those whose feet are not flat. if it had some support design for our curved inside part of our feet, it would be an excellent pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Tika Bahadur Khattri

customer_reviews.title: Very good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe but half a size too small - I have since read elsewhere that this is commonly the case, so suggest you order half a size up!!
customer_reviews.author: W. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: great trainers, really nice bounce in the soles
customer_reviews.text: great trainers, really nice bounce in the soles . I got these has i had knee surgery last year and the surgeon said try not to run? so thought id get a bit more cushioning and they feel good so far.. make sure you get a half size bigger than usual as they come up small.
customer_reviews.author: stuart beedie/Liz Beedie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable and very light. But don't forget to order 1/2 a size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super light and perfect for running. Best trainers I've ever had. I feel like tigger.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. R. Burman

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and lightweight. Bought for gym and ideal for what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: M LE COCQ

customer_reviews.title: Great gym trainers
customer_reviews.text: Go a half size up to what you normally wear in trainers and they will be a great fit. Love these for the gym. So comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rob H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of running shoes. Not too keen on the colour but at the price I'm definitely not complaining
customer_reviews.author: Perez Kaper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Upgraded from the Hyper-33, which was discontinued. They're basically the same shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the shoes are about one size small, usually a ...
customer_reviews.text: the shoes are about one size small, usually a size 41EU,this42size fits his feet, he likes its conservative color, and so light!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, slightly less than half yards than normal shoes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IF u want loads of heel support you may want a different show but overall very nice
customer_reviews.text: Comfy shoes. IF u want loads of heel support you may want a different show but overall very nice shoes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favourite shoe lately together with 33-DFA and Merrell Bare Access Ultra
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. I do have 33-DFA which I like very much, but this is the model with added cushioning which means that it is a bit more comfortable to wear. There is no GEL, but after all it turns out GEL is just a marketing and little more than that. Sizing is in line with other recent Asics like 33-DFA, Zaraca and Nimbus.
customer_reviews.author: Kiril Georgiev

product_meta.title: ASICS 33-Fa, Men's Running Shoes
product_meta.description:
For even easier and more natural running. With the completely revised 33 series you can now experience a completely new running experience. The revised models, all with a reduced to 4 mm explosion, take into account even more the movement of the ankle joints, activate the muscles and support a natural rolling motion. The 33FA replaces the popular GEL-Excel33 that so far the most classic shoe model of the 33 series. 
Recommended runner group: light to medium weight runners. 
Pronation type: neutral rolling motion 
Areas of application: fixed surfaces. 

- Breathable mesh upper 
- Sock-like fit with seamless outer material 
Natural foam midsole. 
Fluid Axis sole construction with deeper flex grooves. 
Minimalist heel structure without heel cap for less shoe weight. 
Activates the muscles and supports a natural rolling motion. 
Abrasion-resistant AHAR+ outsole. 
3M reflectors for good visibility. 
4 mm blasting. 

Colour: blue
